name: Mountainsteering
description:
Race to the top of the mountain and get the flag to bring back to your base! Shoot at your opponents to make them drop the flag.

Specs:

XBOX Controller required

Controls:

Left Stick: Steer

Right Stick: Aim

Left Bumper: Accelerate

Right Bumper: Shoot
